snippet.title: Shadows of Adam - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadows of Adam is a classic JRPG fan’s dream come true. Shadows of Adam brings a compelling story, unique fast-paced battle system and modernized visuals to a beloved genre.

Shadows of Adam now available on Steam, Humble Bundle and Green Man Gaming!

Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/506510/
Humble - https://www.humblebundle.com/store/shadows-of-adam
GMG - https://www.greenmangaming.com/games/shadows-of-adam/

http://www.somethingclassic.net
www.shadowsofadam.com

Trailer by: www.trailersquad.com and Tim Wendorf
Music: Tyler J. Mire (www.tylermiremusic.com)
Guitar Effects: Lindsey Miller

Contact us today!
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SomethingClassicGames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/somethingclassc/
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/somethingclassic
Forums - https://forums.shadowsofadam.com/
